#summary Installing Books.app on your iPhone.

= Introduction =

Installing an application on the iPhone  is not a simple process.  If you don't know what "jailbreak" or "iPHUC" means, you should google those terms.  iFuntastic may also be helpful.


= Details =

See [http://code.google.com/p/mobileterminal/wiki/Installation mobileterminal's install page] for information on how to install an application.  Be warned, it involves installing an SSH server on the iPhone.  Fortunately, [InstallingEBooks] is much easier.
